original: @89b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @89b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: p'a pa bi d'a ra na man ha ra n'a ma lo ka n'a tha sto tra /
analyzed: p'a pa bi d'a ra na man ha ra n'a ma lo ka n'a tha sto tra /
translated: Papavidharanamanoharana-nƒÅmanƒÅthastotra

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'jig rten mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba /
translated: The Praise of LokanƒÅtha, the Delightful Destroyer of Evil

original: thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Great Compassionate One.

original: lha dang lha min mi yis zhabs la phyag byas shing //
analyzed: lha dang lha min mi yis zhabs la phyag byas shing //
translated: Your feet are worshipped by gods, demigods, and humans.

original: skye rga na 'chi ma lus rab tu 'joms pa'i sku //
analyzed: skye rga na 'chi ma lus rab tu 'joms pa'i sku //
translated: Your body completely conquers birth, aging, sickness, and death.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis ni //
translated: O LokanƒÅtha, you who possess compassion,

original: mgon med bdag la bsrung mdzad thugs rje mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: mgon med bdag la bsrung mdzad thugs rje mdzad du gsol //
translated: Please protect me, the one without a protector, with your compassion.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil du ni nub gyir te //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil du ni nub gyir te //
translated: I have sunk into the depths of the ocean of sa·πÉsƒÅra,

original: nyon mongs dba' rlabs kyis ni yang dag nyams nyes shing //
analyzed: nyon mongs dba' rlabs kyis ni yang dag nyams nyes shing //
translated: Ruined by the perfect waves of afflictions,üîΩAnd am being pulled down by the crocodile of death.

original: tsho nges 'debs pa bdag la btang snyoms ma mdzad par //
analyzed: tsho nges 'debs pa bdag la btang snyoms ma mdzad par //
translated: Do not abandon me to indifference.

original: khyod la bstod bgyid thugs rje chen pos bsrung du gsol //
analyzed: khyod la bstod bgyid thugs rje chen pos bsrung du gsol //
translated: I praise you, O Great Compassionate One, please protect me.

original: srid pa'i rab rib kyis ni blo mig nyer gtses shing //
analyzed: srid pa'i rab rib kyis ni blo mig nyer gtses shing //
translated: My mind's eye is afflicted by the cataracts of existence,

original: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yis ni lus sems g-yengs gyur pa //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yis ni lus sems g-yengs gyur pa //
translated: My body and mind are agitated by the fear of death.

original: ji srid mi bzad mnar med gnas sum lhung ba //
analyzed: ji srid mi bzad mnar med gnas sum lhung ba //
translated: For as long as I fall into the unbearable Avƒ´ci hell,

original: bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
translated: Blessed Avalokite≈õvara, please protect me!üîΩOut of delusion, I have constantly relied on others‚Äô wives

original: rmongs pas rgyun du gzhan gyi bud med bsten bgyis dang // srog chags stong phrag srog dang bral ba la sogs pa //
analyzed: rmongs pas rgyun du gzhan gyi bud med bsten bgyis dang // srog chags stong phrag srog dang bral ba la sogs pa //
translated: and have taken the lives of thousands of living beings, and so on.

original: mgon po bdag gis sdug bsngal rgyu ni tshang bar bgyis //
analyzed: mgon po bdag gis sdug bsngal rgyu ni tshang bar bgyis //
translated: Protector, I have fully created the causes of suffering.

original: lus kyi nyes pa de dag yang dag sbyang du gsol //
analyzed: lus kyi nyes pa de dag yang dag sbyang du gsol //
translated: Please purify those physical faults.

original: gang zhig bkur sti'i ched dang 'tsho ba'i ched du ni //
analyzed: gang zhig bkur sti'i ched dang 'tsho ba'i ched du ni //
translated: For the sake of honor and livelihood,

original: 'jig rten mi bden brdzun tshig brlang po la sogs pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten mi bden brdzun tshig brlang po la sogs pa //
translated: I have used false, harsh, and other wrong words in the world.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug ngag gi nyes pa'i kun sbyor yang //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug ngag gi nyes pa'i kun sbyor yang //
translated: Even the entanglements of verbal faults of the Lord of the World

original: dmyal ba'i rgyu de yun rings ma lus goms par bgyis //
analyzed: dmyal ba'i rgyu de yun rings ma lus goms par bgyis //
translated: I have long cultivated as the cause of hell, without remainder.üîΩWhatever harm I have done to sentient beings

original: sems can rnams la rang gis gnod pa gang bgyis dang // gzhan gyis bgyis pa la ni rjes su yi rang ba'i //
analyzed: sems can rnams la rang gis gnod pa gang bgyis dang // gzhan gyis bgyis pa la ni rjes su yi rang ba'i //
translated: and rejoiced in that done by others,

original: bdag gis yid kyi sdig de dag ni smre sngags su //
analyzed: bdag gis yid kyi sdig de dag ni smre sngags su //
translated: I confess these mental sins,

original: 'don zhing mchis pas bsal du gsol dang mgon po kye //
analyzed: 'don zhing mchis pas bsal du gsol dang mgon po kye //
translated: weeping and wailing, O Protector.

original: lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams dang ni //
analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams dang ni //
translated: Among gods, humans, and demigods,

original: dud 'gro dang ni dmyal ba yi dgas rnams su yang //
analyzed: dud 'gro dang ni dmyal ba yi dgas rnams su yang //
translated: among animals, hungry ghosts, and hell beings,

original: sdug bsngal dang bcas 'gro ba gang gnas de dag la//
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang bcas 'gro ba gang gnas de dag la//
translated: wherever beings dwell with suffering,

original: bsrung ba mdzad ces khyod kyi lo rgyus bdag la khums //üîΩdes na bdag la @90a * //
analyzed: bsrung ba mdzad ces khyod kyi lo rgyus bdag la khums // des na bdag la @90a * //
translated: you are known as their protector.üîΩTherefore,

original: thugs rje yang dag mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: thugs rje yang dag mdzad du gsol //
translated: please act with compassion toward me.

original: g-yar lus dar la bab pa yal bar nyams la khad //
analyzed: g-yar lus dar la bab pa yal bar nyams la khad //
translated: My youthful body is wasting away.

original: de phyir ji srid dmyal ba'i gnas su ma zhugs par //
analyzed: de phyir ji srid dmyal ba'i gnas su ma zhugs par //
translated: Therefore, as long as I have not entered the realms of hell,

original: bcom ldan khyod ni bdag gis zhu ba gsan par mdzod //
analyzed: bcom ldan khyod ni bdag gis zhu ba gsan par mdzod //
translated: O BhagavƒÅn, please listen to my request.

original: gzhan yang gzhan don la ni rang nyid gshegs mdzad na //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhan don la ni rang nyid gshegs mdzad na //
translated: Moreover, when you go for the sake of others,

original: bsod nams ma bsags bdag ni spyan sdar mchis kyang spong //
analyzed: bsod nams ma bsags bdag ni spyan sdar mchis kyang spong //
translated: I, who have not accumulated merit, will be abandoned, though I am near.

original: khyod kyi thugs rje bsod nams dag la ltos sam ci //
analyzed: khyod kyi thugs rje bsod nams dag la ltos sam ci //
translated: Do you not consider your compassion and merit?

original: sdug bsngal med la snying rje bya bar su lags na //
analyzed: sdug bsngal med la snying rje bya bar su lags na //
translated: Who would have compassion for one who has no suffering?

original: dran pa tsam gyis khyod ni yongs su mnyes nas su //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis khyod ni yongs su mnyes nas su //
translated: You are completely satisfied by mere recollection,

original: sdig zad mdzad ces bdag gis ma khums lags sam ci//
analyzed: sdig zad mdzad ces bdag gis ma khums lags sam ci//
translated: so why am I not confident that my misdeeds are destroyed?

original: de phyir bcom ldan gzhan phan mdzad la phul du byung //
analyzed: de phyir bcom ldan gzhan phan mdzad la phul du byung //
translated: Therefore, Blessed One, you are supreme in benefiting others.

original: bdag 'dir ma dor bsrung dang bskyab pa mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: bdag 'dir ma dor bsrung dang bskyab pa mdzad du gsol //
translated: Please protect me, do not abandon me here, but keep me safe.üîΩElephants, jewels, sons, queens,üîΩharmless kingdoms, and colorful palaces,

original: glang chen dag dang nor bu sras bcas btsun mo dang // gnod med rgyal srid khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba dang // sha dang rus pa dbu ni sku mtshal mthar thug btang //
analyzed: glang chen dag dang nor bu sras bcas btsun mo dang // gnod med rgyal srid khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba dang // sha dang rus pa dbu ni sku mtshal mthar thug btang //
translated: flesh, bones, head, and even blood, you gave away.

original: grub pa'i mig sman rkang pa byug pa dag dang ni //
analyzed: grub pa'i mig sman rkang pa byug pa dag dang ni //
translated: You gave away the eye medicine of accomplishment, the ointment for the feet,

original: grub pa'i gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mo dag kyang //
analyzed: grub pa'i gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mo dag kyang //
translated: and the accomplished yak·π£as and yak·π£i·πáƒ´s.üîΩThose who please you, O Lord of the World,

original: 'jig rten mnga'a bdag khyod ni mnyes par gang su dag / don gnyer rnams la mthar thug ma mchis sbyin par mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten mnga'a bdag khyod ni mnyes par gang su dag / don gnyer rnams la mthar thug ma mchis sbyin par mdzad //
translated: give to those in need without limit.

original: gang dag rkang pa lag pa mig dang bral rnams dang // sna tshogs bro 'tshal gyis ni 'jigs pa dang bcas rnams //
analyzed: gang dag rkang pa lag pa mig dang bral rnams dang // sna tshogs bro 'tshal gyis ni 'jigs pa dang bcas rnams //
translated: and those who are frightened by the fear of the Lord of Death,

original: yon tan zab mo khyod mnyes pa yis de dag gi //
analyzed: yon tan zab mo khyod mnyes pa yis de dag gi //
translated: by pleasing you, O One of Profound Qualities,

original: yan lag sobs 'gyur bro 'tshal dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yan lag sobs 'gyur bro 'tshal dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur //
translated: their limbs will be restored and their illnesses will be pacified.

original: mkha' lding sprul gdug gnod dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ni //
analyzed: mkha' lding sprul gdug gnod dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ni //
translated: The harm of garu·∏ças, poisonous snakes, and ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´s,

original: rnal 'byor ma yi gnod kun rtag tu zhi mdzad cing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi gnod kun rtag tu zhi mdzad cing //
translated: and all the harm of yoginƒ´s, will always be pacified.

original: rgyal ba khyod kyis gang la dgongs pa de la ni//
analyzed: rgyal ba khyod kyis gang la dgongs pa de la ni//
translated: O Victorious One, to those whom you think of,

original: gshin rje'i pho nya rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gshin rje'i pho nya rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: the messengers of the Lord of Death will not be seen even in dreams.

original: mgon po bdag ni 'jigs pas rnam par g-yengs pa yis //
analyzed: mgon po bdag ni 'jigs pas rnam par g-yengs pa yis //
translated: O Protector, I, being agitated by fear,

original: nyin dang mtshan du lag pa gyen du brkyang ste du //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du lag pa gyen du brkyang ste du //
translated: stretch out my arms day and night.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug des na bdag ni 'gums pa dang // nye ba lags na bcom ldan skyabs med 'bor ram ci //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug des na bdag ni 'gums pa dang // nye ba lags na bcom ldan skyabs med 'bor ram ci //
translated: O Loke≈õvara, I am about to die and am in distress - will the Blessed One abandon me, who is without refuge?

original: yul dang dbang po gdul dka' sems kyang g-yo ba dang // mnyam par ma bzhag lus kyis sdig pa mang po bgyis //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po gdul dka' sems kyang g-yo ba dang // mnyam par ma bzhag lus kyis sdig pa mang po bgyis //
translated: And with an uncollected body, I have committed many sins.

original: nyams pa bdag gi 'khor bzhin du ni skye ba 'dir //
analyzed: nyams pa bdag gi 'khor bzhin du ni skye ba 'dir //
translated: In this life, I have been like a ruined house,

original: thams cad kyis ni sdig pa 'ba' zhig bsgrubs par zad //
analyzed: thams cad kyis ni sdig pa 'ba' zhig bsgrubs par zad //
translated: And have only accomplished evil.

original: de phyir da ltar khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni //üîΩ'jig rten dbang phyug gang gis @90b ngan song sdug bsngal dag //
analyzed: de phyir da ltar khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni // 'jig rten dbang phyug gang gis @90b ngan song sdug bsngal dag //
translated: Therefore, now I join my palms and pray to you,üîΩThat I may go to a happy rebirth in your presence,

original: myong mi 'gyur bar khyod kyi spyan sngar bde 'gror ni //
analyzed: myong mi 'gyur bar khyod kyi spyan sngar bde 'gror ni //
translated: Where I will not experience the sufferings of the lower realms.

original: mchi bar bdag zhu 'di ni gnang bar mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: mchi bar bdag zhu 'di ni gnang bar mdzad du gsol //
translated: Please grant me this!

original: khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par 'joms pa'i sku //
analyzed: khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par 'joms pa'i sku //
translated: You are the body that completely conquers attachment and anger,

original: khyod ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen gyi ni chu lon lags //
analyzed: khyod ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen gyi ni chu lon lags //
translated: You are the dam for the great ocean of samsara,

original: khyod ni ltung bas skrag pa 'dren pa'i lag pa ste//
analyzed: khyod ni ltung bas skrag pa 'dren pa'i lag pa ste//
translated: You are the hand that rescues those afraid of falling,

original: khyod ni brjed bcas mi dge 'dzin pa'i sgra gcan lags //
analyzed: khyod ni brjed bcas mi dge 'dzin pa'i sgra gcan lags //
translated: You are Rahu, who seizes the waning non-virtue.

original: khyod ni bde gshegs bla med de nyid ston pa po //
analyzed: khyod ni bde gshegs bla med de nyid ston pa po //
translated: You are the teacher of the unsurpassed truth of the Sugatas,

original: khyod ni sdug bsngal mang ldan 'gro ba'i skyob byed yin //
analyzed: khyod ni sdug bsngal mang ldan 'gro ba'i skyob byed yin //
translated: You are the protector of beings who have many sufferings.

original: khyod ni yid 'joms gdul dka'i bdud las nges brgal ba //
analyzed: khyod ni yid 'joms gdul dka'i bdud las nges brgal ba //
translated: You have definitely overcome MƒÅra, who is hard to subdue and who destroys the mind.

original: khyod ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal ba lags //
analyzed: khyod ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal ba lags //
translated: You have crossed to the other side of the ocean of existence.

original: khyod ni nad pa ma lus nad ni rgyun gcod sku //
analyzed: khyod ni nad pa ma lus nad ni rgyun gcod sku //
translated: Your body, O Sage, is the one who severs the continuum of all the illnesses of the sick.

original: khyod kyi sku ni 'gro ba'i nang na mchog tu mdzes //
analyzed: khyod kyi sku ni 'gro ba'i nang na mchog tu mdzes //
translated: Your body is the most beautiful in the world.

original: khyod ni dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho chen po ste //
analyzed: khyod ni dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho chen po ste //
translated: You are the great ocean of incomparable compassion.

original: khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs //
analyzed: khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs //
translated: You are realized by beings as a friend without a cause.

original: khyod kyis g-yo ba'i dbang po 'bad pha med par btul //
analyzed: khyod kyis g-yo ba'i dbang po 'bad pha med par btul //
translated: You have tamed the moving sense faculties without effort.

original: khyod ni yul la chags pa yongs su bcom pa lags //
analyzed: khyod ni yul la chags pa yongs su bcom pa lags //
translated: You are the one who has completely conquered attachment to objects.üîΩYour mind is in the highest meditative concentration.

original: khyod kyi thugs ni bsam gtan mchog la mnyam par bzhag / khyod kyi thugs ni song ba kun la snyoms par mdzad //
analyzed: khyod kyi thugs ni bsam gtan mchog la mnyam par bzhag / khyod kyi thugs ni song ba kun la snyoms par mdzad //
translated: Your mind is impartial toward all who have gone.

original: thugs rje ldan pa gzhan la phan par mdzad kyang ni //
analyzed: thugs rje ldan pa gzhan la phan par mdzad kyang ni //
translated: You are compassionate and act to benefit others.

original: mi rig sbrul chen rgyab tu zhon nas yul rnams kyi //
analyzed: mi rig sbrul chen rgyab tu zhon nas yul rnams kyi //
translated: You ride on the back of the great, unknowable serpent.

original: 'dod pas dge ba nyams par gyur pa bdag la 'dir //
analyzed: 'dod pas dge ba nyams par gyur pa bdag la 'dir //
translated: I have lost my virtue through desire.

original: khyod ni gang gis yongs su dgyes par mi mdzad lags //üîΩkhyod kyi spyan sngar g-yar chab 'byin cing smre ba yi //
analyzed: khyod ni gang gis yongs su dgyes par mi mdzad lags // khyod kyi spyan sngar g-yar chab 'byin cing smre ba yi //
translated: Why do you not delight in me?

original: sdig ldan bdag la gang gis bsrung ba mi mdzad na //
analyzed: sdig ldan bdag la gang gis bsrung ba mi mdzad na //
translated: I am a sinner, and I have no protector,üîΩsince I must stand before you and confess.

original: mgon po 'gro ba kun rten thugs rje gang lags pa /
analyzed: mgon po 'gro ba kun rten thugs rje gang lags pa /
translated: O Protector, you are the refuge of all beings,

original: de ci khyod kyis nyi tshe ba ru bskyed lags sam //
analyzed: de ci khyod kyis nyi tshe ba ru bskyed lags sam //
translated: why have you generated this limited compassion?

original: mgon po khyod kyi thugs rjes nam mkha' khyab pa yi //
analyzed: mgon po khyod kyi thugs rjes nam mkha' khyab pa yi //
translated: O Protector, your compassion pervades the sky,üîΩlike the rain that falls from the clouds, on the land and the dry river beds,

original: sprin byung char pa'i rgyun ni chu dang skam dag dang // mtho na dman yul ni kun 'bab cing sems can gyi //
analyzed: sprin byung char pa'i rgyun ni chu dang skam dag dang // mtho na dman yul ni kun 'bab cing sems can gyi //
translated: on the high and the low places, and it benefits all beings,üîΩday and night, without interruption.üîΩO Bhagavat, whatever merit I have

original: don du kun la nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad du 'jug / de ltar bcom ldan dran pa'i bdag gi bsod nams gang //
analyzed: don du kun la nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad du 'jug / de ltar bcom ldan dran pa'i bdag gi bsod nams gang //
translated: from remembering you,üîΩmay it be for the sake of all beings,

original: des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag gis //
analyzed: des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag gis //
translated: that they may have many joys.

original: 'gro nang mdzes pa rnam mang rnam par rol pa yi //
analyzed: 'gro nang mdzes pa rnam mang rnam par rol pa yi //
translated: May they be beautiful in the midst of beings,üîΩand may they have many enjoyments.

original: po ta la yi ri rtser gnas pa thob par shog /'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba /üîΩshar phyogs ba ren da'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /üîΩ// / rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren da'i @91a * //
analyzed: po ta la yi ri rtser gnas pa thob par shog /'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba / shar phyogs ba ren da'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so / // / rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren da'i @91a * //
translated: This is the end of the enchanting praise of Avalokite≈õvara called ‚ÄúDestroyer of Evil,‚ÄùüîΩcomposed by the great scholar Candragomin of Varendra in the east.

original: dz'a ga la'i pandi ta chen po d'a na sh'i las bsgyur ba//
analyzed: dz'a ga la'i pandi ta chen po d'a na sh'i las bsgyur ba//
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot DƒÅna≈õƒ´la and the great Tibetan translator Venerable Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.
